text: Spoon sweets are sweet preserves, given in a spoon as a sign of welcoming in Bosnia, Serbia, Albania, Greece, Turkey, Kosovo, Cyprus, the Balkans, parts of the Middle East, and Russia. They can be made from almost any fruit, though sour and bitter fruits are especially prized. title: Spoon sweets
